text: This is a list of Costa Rican Twenty20 International cricketers who have played at least one Twenty20 International for Costa Rica after playing their first match in April 2019. ==Key== General * – Captain * – Wicket-keeper * First – Year of debut * Last – Year of latest game * Mat – Number of matches played Batting * Runs – Runs scored in career * HS – Highest score * Avg – Runs scored per dismissal * * – Batsman remained not out * 50 – Number of half centuries Bowling * Balls – Balls bowled in career * Wkt – Wickets taken in career * BBI – Best bowling in an innings * Ave – Average runs per wicket Fielding * Ca – Catches taken * St – Stumpings affected Italic text ==List of players== :Statistics are correct as of 14 April 2024.Players / Costa Rica / T20I caps – ESPNcricinfo. Retrieved 25 April 2019. title: List of Costa Rica Twenty20 International cricketers
